Wisdom: الظُّلْمُ يُزِلُّ الْقَدَمَ وَيَسْلُبُ النِّعَمَ وَيُهْلِكُ الْأُمَمَ
enWisdom: Injustice makes the foot slip, takes away blessings and destroys nations
Wantonness takes away blessings and brings chastisement

Wisdom: دَوَامُ الظُّلْمِ يَسْلُبُ النِّعَمَ وَيَجْلِبُ النِّقَمَ
enWisdom: Continued injustice takes away blessings and brings forth chastisement
How many a blessing has been removed by injustice!
Oppression is sufficient for the removal of blessing

Wisdom: كَفَى بِالظُّلْمِ طَارِداً لِلنِّعْمَةِ وَجَالِباً لِلنِّقْمَةِ
enWisdom: Injustice is enough of a dispeller of blessing and an invoker of chastisement

Wisdom: لَيْسَ شَيْ‏ءٌ أَدْعَى [أَرْعَى‏] إِلَى زَوَالِ نِعْمَةٍ وَتَعْجِيلِ نِقْمَةٍ مِنْ إِقَامَةٍ عَلَى ظُلْمٍ
enWisdom: There is nothing that is more summoning of the removal of blessing and the hastening of chastisement than remaining steadfast upon injustice

Wisdom: اتَّقُوا الْبَغْيَ فَإِنَّهُ يَجْلِبُ النِّقَمَ وَيَسْلُبُ النِّعَمَ وَيُوجِبُ الْغِيَرَ
enWisdom: Beware of oppression, for verily it brings [divine] retribution, dispels blessings and causes changes in circumstances

Wisdom: أَبْلَغُ مَا تُسْتَجْلَبُ بِهِ النِّقْمَةُ الْبَغْيُ وَكُفْرُ النِّعْمَةِ
enWisdom: The actions that are most effective in bringing chastisement are oppression and ingratitude for blessings
By oppression, chastisement is brought down
How close is the punishment of Allah to the oppressors (or the unjust) and wrongdoers!

Wisdom: مَا أَقْرَبَ النَّقِمَةَ مِنْ أَهْلِ الظُّلْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ
enWisdom: How close is the punishment of Allah to the oppressors (or the unjust) and wrongdoers!
